payload.description: React-based framework for building dynamic, Shopify-powered custom storefronts.

pull_request.title: Add Oxygen deployment workflow file
pull_request.body:
Shopify detected that your Hydrogen storefront repository doesn't contain an Oxygen deployment workflow file. This file is required to enable continuous deployment to Oxygen hosting.

Merging this pull request will do the following:

- Create `oxygen-deployment-1000004534.yml` in your GitHub workflow directory.
If you've previously made customizations to this file, then this PR might overwrite it. Be sure to review all changes before merging.

 To start this Hydrogen app in your local development environment, run this command:
 `PUBLIC_STORE_DOMAIN=jamieguerrero.myshopify.com PUBLIC_STOREFRONT_API_TOKEN=f81dd337149cd7d4ef42085492c3d857 yarn dev`.

pull_request.title: Add Oxygen deployment workflow file
pull_request.body:
Shopify detected that your Hydrogen storefront repository doesn't contain an Oxygen deployment workflow file. This file is required to enable continuous deployment to Oxygen hosting.

Merging this pull request will do the following:

- Create `oxygen-deployment-1000003529.yml` in your GitHub workflow directory.
If you've previously made customizations to this file, then this PR might overwrite it. Be sure to review all changes before merging.

 To start this Hydrogen app in your local development environment, run this command:
 `PUBLIC_STORE_DOMAIN=ee85b8-2.myshopify.com PUBLIC_STOREFRONT_API_TOKEN=c8735422159da99e6d3d4879e03d32ad yarn dev`.
